Package cp213

Class Reactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cp213.Reactor

  • public class Reactor
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple nuclear reactor simulation. Given a starting temperature and control rods heights, attempt to control the reactor over a period of time.
    Version:
    2019-04-03
    Author:
    Anastasia Martynovitch, David Brown

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reactor

        public Reactor​(double initialTemperature,
               int initialRodsHeight)
        Reactor constructor.
        Parameters:
        initialTemperature - The initial temperature of the reactor.
        initialRodsHeight - The initial heights of the reactor control rods.

    • Method Detail

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        public void addPropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Attaches listeners to the model.
        Parameters:

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        public void addPropertyChangeListener​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                      java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Attaches listeners to the model for a particular property.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property to listen for.
        listener - The listener to attach to the model.

      • dropRods

        public void dropRods​()
        Drops the rods entirely into the reactor core - i.e. set the rods lengths to the maximum rods lengths.

      • getAveragePower

        public double getAveragePower​()
        Returns the average power produced by the reactor since the start of a simulation.
        Returns:
        average power.

      • getAverageTemperature

        public double getAverageTemperature​()
        Returns the average temperature of the reactor since the start of a simulation.
        Returns:
        average temperature.

      • getPower

        public double getPower​()
        Returns the reactor's current power level.
        Returns:
        power.

      • getRodsHeight

        public int getRodsHeight​()
        Returns the reactor's current rod heights.
        Returns:
        rodsHeight.

      • getStatus

        public Reactor.Status getStatus​()
        Returns the reactor's current status.
        Returns:
        status.

      • getTemperature

        public double getTemperature​()
        Returns the reactor's current temperature.
        Returns:
        temperature.

      • getTicks

        public int getTicks​()
        Returns the number of ticks since the beginning of a simulation.
        Returns:
        ticks

      • lowerRods

        public void lowerRods​()
        Lower the rod heights by one step. Rods cannot be lowered by more than one step per tick.

      • raiseRods

        public void raiseRods​()
        Raise the rod heights by one step. Rods cannot be raised by more than one step per tick.

      • quit

        public void quit​()
        Sets reactor status to FINISHED.

      • tick

        public void tick​()
        Increment the simulation tick by one. Update the reactor temperature, power, and status (in that order), and allow the rods to be raised or lowered during this tick.
